title: Android 10 - where is Ambient mode for Double Tap option?
content:
Hi! I have Pixel 2 XL.
After Android 10 update (with factory reset) I can't enable Ambient mode for Double Tap option. On Double Tap screen is completelly turnig on not in Ambient mode like it was in Android 9 Pie. How Ican I return this option?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
